      • represent

        @Get
public org.restlet.representation.Representation represent()
                                                    throws org.json.JSONException
        Pulls information on drugs from open.fda.gov and enhances the result with additional data from DailyMed.
        Parameters:
        String - ServerKey Used to authenticate the server requesting data
        String - DrugName Name of drug needing information
        Returns:
        JSONObject
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
